work.position: Software Developer, Data Scientist, Tableau Specialist
highlights: Worked as a Software Developer and Tableau Expert for a big data analytics company.
Developed and maintained a tool for unstructured text classification based on rules specified by analysts, now used in all projects in the company.
Developed innovative models for extracting insights from big data in various industries.
Became the point person on all Tableau related work and optimizations in the company.
Worked as an Independent Software Developer for a realty investments company.
Developed a system for automation of tax reporting to the federal government.
Worked as an In-House Software Developer creating internal tools for an IT services company.
Developed a scheduling tool for use by the Field Services department to schedule onsite visits by engineers.
Developed a price calculator for use by the Commercial Department to onboard new clients and give price estimates.
Developed various proof-of-concept projects for automation, DevOps, and reporting.
Worked as the Lead Software Developer for a recruiting startup.
Developed data scraping tools for scraping various online profiles of potential new hires for high tech companies in the Philadelphia region.
Developed map-based visualization tools to see where various clients were located in relation to possible new hires.

projects.name: Artemis - The High Performance Data Hunter
projects.description: An automated high performance data scraper designed to hunt for data, structure the retrieved data, and input it into a database. Anything that fails to find the correct data is crowdsourced to allow the application to learn where to find the correct data.

projects.name: WoPair
projects.description: An application currently in development to allow people to find nearby users with like-minded preferences to workout with.
